summary: An ordinance authorizing and directing the Mayor and the City Comptroller for an in behalf of the City of Seattle to sign a quit-claim deed in favor of Ridge Homes Inc., a corporation, for a certain portion of Tract "C", all of Tract "D", and certain portions of Lots 43 and 44, Block 5, all in Lake Ridge Division No. 4, reserving an easement for sewer purposes.
